definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: The grip cover lies directly over the hammering end of the tool.
sentences.chinese: 抓地力覆盖在于直接在锤打结束工具。

sentences.english: I was sliding everywhere, with absolutely no grip at all.
sentences.chinese: 赛车根本没有抓地力，我一直在不断的打滑。

sentences.english: Near-silent keys and a soft-touch mouse grip.
sentences.chinese: 近无声键和一个软触摸鼠标抓地力。

sentences.english: The deluge was so torrential that even the wet tyres could not provide sufficient grip.
sentences.chinese: 暴雨大到雨胎都不足以保证赛车有足够的抓地力。

sentences.english: These foothills have been farmed out with tobacco.
sentences.chinese: 这些丘陵地由于专种烟草而耗尽了地力。

sentences.english: Recommended for trail runners who frequently mix in some roads and don't want to sacrifice off-road traction.
sentences.chinese: 经常混合路跑的，又不想牺牲越野跑抓地力的跑者。

sentences.english: Twin Gripping Jaws The jaws have sculptured liners which give an excellent grip.
sentences.chinese: 双人夹爪的下巴有衬里的雕塑给一个很好的抓地力。

sentences.english: DVS skate shoes and grip great and superior comfort.
sentences.chinese: DVS的滑板鞋有很大的抓地力和卓越的舒适性。

sentences.english: In addition, gastrointestinal function and strong people , standing toe grip is also very solid.
sentences.chinese: 此外，胃肠功能强的人，站在脚趾抓地力也非常稳固。

sentences.english: This leads to vastly reduced levels of grip.
sentences.chinese: 这会导致抓地力大大降低。

sentences.english: I prefer to use a double overhand grip except for PR.
sentences.chinese: 我更喜欢使用双除公关上手抓地力。

sentences.english: Speaking of the grip, it is a soft leather grip from Australia.
sentences.chinese: 在抓地力上，它是从澳大利亚软皮抓地力。

sentences.english: Speaking of the grip, it is a soft leather grip from Australia.
sentences.chinese: 在抓地力上，它是从澳大利亚软皮抓地力。

sentences.english: Also gloves can help you to attain a better grip on the handlebars too.
sentences.chinese: 手套也可以帮助你实现一个更好的抓地力的扶手也。

sentences.english: "Pressure is as important as grip, " explains Prosser.
Hallux support toe-bar prevents the foot from slipping forward to improve grip.
sentences.chinese: 拇趾支持脚趾酒吧防止脚向前滑动，以改善抓地力。

definition: to maintain the land (with rotation of crops or fertilizer)
the state of moisture in the soil (and whether it can support a crop)
